Level Ten
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Ten
By Y.K.TAN on Monday, July 16, 2001 - 03:23 am:

STAGE 10


Move six steps right,when start,and destroy the box above you,and you will get a bell. Take the bell,and the suzurin will come. Face left wards,and create a box,and jump on the box. Wait until the psylora is out of sight,and as quick as possible,create a box,jump on it,grab the golden key,and destroy the box which you just created for standing and grabbing the golden key,because if the psylora is block off,it may go in an unpredictable diraction. After that,jump of the metal box,and move all the way left. Face right,and create a box,and stand on it. Face left,and create a box,and stand on it. Now,face right,create a box,when the psylora is far from you,and stand on the box,and face the other direction and create another box which is underneath you to stand on,and quickly destroy the other box which is underneath you now. And keep repeating this until you reach the top with another box there,destroy the box,and get the mystery disc piece. Create box underneath of you,until the top psylora get out of it's normal path,than create a box,to block it from attacking you,while it is away,create boxes underneath you,to win the stage,and THERE,YOU WIN STAGE 10.
